style.description: 格式（不影响代码运行的变动）

chore.description: 构建过程或辅助工具的变动

refactor.description: 重构（既不是新增功能，也不是修改bug的代码变动）

scripts.watch:dd: cross-env NODE_ENV=development API_ENV=dev WATCHING=true npx taro build --type dd --watch
scripts.watch:weapp: cross-env NODE_ENV=development API_ENV=dev WATCHING=true npx taro build --type weapp --watch
scripts.watch:alipay: cross-env NODE_ENV=development API_ENV=dev WATCHING=true npx taro build --type alipay --watch
scripts.watch:tt: cross-env NODE_ENV=development API_ENV=dev WATCHING=true npx taro build --type tt --watch
scripts.watch:h5: cross-env NODE_ENV=development API_ENV=dev WATCHING=true npx taro build --type h5 --watch
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development API_ENV=dev WATCHING=true npx taro build --type h5 --watch
scripts.dev:dd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENV=dev npx taro build --type dd
scripts.dev:weapp: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENV=dev npx taro build --type weapp
scripts.dev:alipay: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENV=dev npx taro build --type alipay
scripts.dev:tt: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENV=dev npx taro build --type tt
scripts.dev:h5: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENV=dev PUBLIC_PATH=https://x.x.com/${API_ENV}/${pkgName}/${version}/ npx taro build --type h5
scripts.real:dd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENV=real npx taro build --type dd
scripts.real:weapp: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENV=real npx taro build --type weapp
scripts.real:alipay: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENV=real npx taro build --type alipay
scripts.real:tt: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENV=real npx taro build --type tt
scripts.real:h5: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENV=real PUBLIC_PATH=https://x.x.com/${API_ENV}/${pkgName}/${version}/ npx taro build --type h5
scripts.real:h5Doc: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENV=real  PUBLIC_PATH=./ npx taro build --type h5
